title: Noun collection 1
sentences: The house is very old and big.
I go to work by car.
There is a book lying on the table.
The table is made of wood.
I am sitting on a chair.
I am drinking a glass of water.
The sun is shining brightly today.
The tree in the garden is very tall.
I am buying a flower for my mother.
The city is very loud at night.
In school, we learn a lot.
My bag is blue and heavy.
The child is playing in the garden.
We are going into the park.
I need a key for my apartment.
The dog is sleeping in the basket.
I am eating a red apple.
The coffee is still very hot.
Would you like sugar in your tea?
A glass of wine in the evening is nice.
dictionary:
das Haus - house
das Auto - car
das Buch - book
der Tisch - table
der Stuhl - chair
das Brot - bread
das Wasser - water
die Sonne - sun
der Baum - tree
die Blume - flower
die Stadt - city
die Schule - school
die Tasche - bag
das Kind - child
der Park - park
das Fenster - window
die Tür - door
die Küche - kitchen
die Straße - street
der Schlüssel - key
der Hund - dog
der Apfel - apple
der Kaffee - coffee
der Zucker - sugar
der Wein - wine
